subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] ghost box hacks
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1682314506-1196558923=:28882
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I am so sorry all of you are going through this.  Your in our thoughts and prayers!  You are all doing positive things and they will prevail!

Sumra Dume <duck@...> wrote:          Colleagues,

Thank you for your concern. 
Events that unfolded early this morning have prompted me to 
effectively close the Ghostboxhacks site for the near term. 
Do to the nature of these events it is inappropriate to discuss the 
matter in a public form such as this. 

Please do not speculate on the nature of this event. I am sorry, 
after talking to council I removed my statement from Ghostboxhacks.
I don't want to fuel wild speculation. 

I wish I could go in to greater detail, at this time I have been 
advised not to.

Thank you, Everyone for your emails and concern.

-Sum



                         


  The contents of this eletronic correspondence is private & confidential and meant only for the party and/or parties it is addressed to.  
   
  No part of this email transmission may be publicly posted or forwarded to other parties without explicit written permission.
